info.description: This documentation describes the Gitea API.
info.title: Gitea API.

post.summary: Add a public key on behalf of a user

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the key to delete

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: username of the user that will own the created organization

post.summary: Create a repository on behalf a user

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: username of the user. This user will own the created repository

post.summary: Render a markdown document as HTML
Create a repository in an organization

parameters.name: org
parameters.description: name of the organization to get

parameters.description: name of the organization to edit

parameters.name: id

parameters.description: id of the hook to update

get.summary: Check if a user is a member of an organization

delete.summary: Remove a member from an organization

get.summary: Check if a user is a public member of an organization

404.description: user is not a public member

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: search only for repos that the user with the given id owns or contributes to

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: page number of results to return (1-based)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: page size of results, maximum page size is 50

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: type of repository to search for. Supported values are "fork", "source", "mirror" and "collaborative"

parameters.name: exclusive
parameters.description: if `uid` is given, search only for repos that the user owns

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: owner of the repo to delete

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: name of the repo to delete

get.summary: Get an archive of a repository

parameters.name: archive
parameters.description: archive to download, consisting of a git reference and archive

parameters.description: username of the collaborator to delete

AddCollaboratorOption.description: AddCollaboratorOption options when adding a user as a collaborator of a repository

AddTimeOption.description: AddTimeOption options for adding time to an issue

Comment.description: Comment represents a comment on a commit or issue

CreateEmailOption.description: CreateEmailOption options when creating email addresses

CreateForkOption.description: CreateForkOption options for creating a fork

organization.description: organization name, if forking into an organization

CreateGPGKeyOption.description: CreateGPGKeyOption options create user GPG key

armored_public_key.description: An armored GPG key to add

CreateHookOption.description: CreateHookOption options when create a hook

CreateIssueCommentOption.description: CreateIssueCommentOption options for creating a comment on an issue

CreateIssueOption.description: CreateIssueOption options to create one issue

CreateKeyOption.description: CreateKeyOption options when creating a key

key.description: An armored SSH key to add

read_only.description: Describe if the key has only read access or read/write

title.description: Title of the key to add

CreateLabelOption.description: CreateLabelOption options for creating a label

CreateMilestoneOption.description: CreateMilestoneOption options for creating a milestone

CreateOrgOption.description: CreateOrgOption options for creating an organization

CreatePullRequestOption.description: CreatePullRequestOption options when creating a pull request

CreateReleaseOption.description: CreateReleaseOption options when creating a release

auto_init.description: Whether the repository should be auto-intialized?

description.description: Description of the repository to create

name.description: Name of the repository to create

readme.description: Readme of the repository to create

CreateStatusOption.description: CreateStatusOption holds the information needed to create a new Status for a Commit

CreateTeamOption.description: CreateTeamOption options for creating a team

DeleteEmailOption.description: DeleteEmailOption options when deleting email addresses

EditHookOption.description: EditHookOption options when modify one hook

EditIssueCommentOption.description: EditIssueCommentOption options for editing a comment

EditIssueOption.description: EditIssueOption options for editing an issue

EditLabelOption.description: EditLabelOption options for editing a label

EditMilestoneOption.description: EditMilestoneOption options for editing a milestone

EditOrgOption.description: EditOrgOption options for editing an organization

EditPullRequestOption.description: EditPullRequestOption options when modify pull request

EditReleaseOption.description: EditReleaseOption options when editing a release

EditTeamOption.description: EditTeamOption options for editing a team

Email.description: Email an email address belonging to a user

GPGKey.description: GPGKey a user GPG key to sign commit and tag in repository

GPGKeyEmail.description: GPGKeyEmail an email attached to a GPGKey

Issue.description: Issue represents an issue in a repository

Label.description: Label a label to an issue or a pr

Text.description:
Text markdown to render

in: body

Wiki.description:
Is it a wiki page ?

in: body

Milestone.description: Milestone milestone is a collection of issues on one repository

PayloadCommitVerification.description: PayloadCommitVerification represents the GPG verification of a commit

PayloadUser.description: PayloadUser represents the author or committer of a commit

name.description: Full name of the commit author

Permission.description: Permission represents a set of permissions

PublicKey.description: PublicKey publickey is a user key to push code to repository

PullRequestMeta.description: PullRequestMeta PR info if an issue is a PR

SearchResults.description: SearchResults results of a successful search

ServerVersion.description: ServerVersion wraps the version of the server

Status.description: Status holds a single Status of a single Commit

StatusState.description:
StatusState holds the state of a Status
It can be "pending", "success", "error", "failure", and "warning"

Team.description: Team represents a team in an organization

TrackedTime.description: TrackedTime worked time for an issue / pr

WatchInfo.description: WatchInfo represents an API watch status of one repository

AccessToken.description: AccessToken represents a API access token.

AccessTokenList.description: AccessTokenList represents a list of API access token.

MarkdownRender.description: MarkdownRender is a rendered markdown document

forbidden.description: APIForbiddenError is a forbidden error response

notFound.description: APINotFound is a not found empty response

validationError.description: APIValidationError is error format response related to input validation
